You can install a new jar in your project's classpath, and remove the
JUNIT=
_PATH element.  However, Kent and I were talking just Monday
night about th=
e fact that we end up coding on the latest version of
JUnit, but supporting=
, mostly, whatever last shipped with Eclipse.  So
suggestions on how to mos=
t easily enable Eclipse users to stay up to
date are most welcome.

   Davi=
d Saff
